Text:
The link to the forum didnt work. 

I really like your posting here. Do you have more Violine?

Suprbay is out of the air just now, in a day it should work again :P

I also didn't mean that I don't react on comic requests here, only that it takes on average a week to get a response here, and two days max on suprbay :D

I sadly don't have more of Violine yet.
I can, however, reassure you it's coming :D
Since I'm not associated with the project, I sadly can't give you an indication how long it will take...
the artwork on this comic is amazing, thanks, never heard of this one

Thanks..keep up the good work.

Nobody has Arad and Maya yet? 
The sci-fi comedy adventure of a pair of cutie lovers exploring strange and wondrous planets?

Sigh..Storm and Trigan too..english of course lol
